page.title: 02Marchiel & Bangor is y Coed
page.content:
INDUSTRY The only industrial plant is a creamery employing about 500 staff manufacturing butter, cheese and skimmed milk products.
HOUSING The majority of the housing lies in the village of Bangor is y Coed and that part of the village of Marchiel lying in the North West of this area. There is a hamlet at Cross Lanes with farm houses and other houses scattered throughout the area.
ROADS An A class single carriageway main road runs from the North West tothe South East corner of the area. Other roads are secondary and minor.
